aka: Hours to Kill – Zeitachse des Todes
trans_title: Hours to Kill – Zeitachse des Todes
introduction: For detectives, the key to solving the toughest homicides lies somewhere within the final 24 hours of the victim’s life. Homicide: Hours to Kill is a true-crime documentary series that follows determined investigators as they piece together events during this critical window to reconstruct the timeline of the murder, unlock the motive, and identify the perpetrator.From jealous spouses and obsessed stalkers, to buried secrets and smoking guns, each episode is a deadly puzzle where viewers follow every step of the pulse-pounding search.S3 E1 House Of HorrorS3 E2 A Mother's Secret LifeS3 E3 Who's There?S3 E4 Fatal AddictionS3 E5 Web Of LiesS3 E6 Death Of An Insurance ManS3 E7 Who's Behind The TriggerS3 E8 Almost A Perfect MurderS3 E9 Dangerous LiaisonS3 E10 To Know Her Was To Love HerS3 E11 Death TrapS3 E12 Dark Side of The DealS3 E13 Love Tug of WarS3 E14 Data Doesn't LieS3 E16 The FreshmanS3 E17 Murder On The Jordan RiverS3 E18 One Bloody FingerprintS3 E19 The Mystery PassengerS3 E20 If I Killed LisaS3 E21 Clock In For MurderS3 E22 If The Glove FitsS3 E23 Five Million Reasons For MurderS3 E24 A Murder in MariettaS3 E25 Do Si DeathS3 E26 The BeneficiaryProducer: Cineflix Productions
